sia-desc: Allows for adding annotations to image files.
sia-i18n-welcome: Willkommen bei der Lokalisierungs- und Internationalisierungsdatei der Programmerweiterung Annotator.
sia-special-intro: Welcome to the special page for the Semantic Image Annotator extension.
sia-reinstall-text:
Click the reinstall button to reinstall this extension. Reinstalling will overwrite any existing templates, forms, properties and categories that are related to this extension.

The following properties will be recreated:
*Property:Annotation_of
*Property:Annotation_code
*Property:AnnotationComment
*Property:LastModificationDate
*Property:LastModificationUser
*Property:AnnotationMetadata

The following categories will be recreated:
*Category:Annotation
*Category:ImageAnnotation

In addition, the following pages will be overwritten:
*Template:ImageAnnotation
*Form:ImageAnnotation
\Finally, links to existing Page Forms will be deleted. The Page Forms themselves will not be deleted.
sia-request-reinstall: Links to existing Page Forms are deleted. Templates, forms, properties and categories related to this extension will be overwritten.
sia-button-desc: Click here to annotate this article.
sia-repair-button-desc: Click here to repair moved annotations.
sia-repair-notification: Not all annotations could be assigned correctly. Please start the Annotations Repair Mode.
sia-autogenerate-summary: The page was autogenerated by the Semantic Image Annotator extension.
sia-install-description: Please click the install button before using this extension. This will create two wiki pages, Form:ImageAnnotation and Template:ImageAnnotation.
sia-install-success: Installation finished successfully. Please reload the page.
sia-category-pageform-assignment-descrip: Here you can set up the annotation categories to be used by this extension. You will need to assign a Page Forms form to any category and select a color.
sia-main-page-description: This page shows all annotations for the image file
sia-please-install: You have not yet installed the extension. Please go to special page.
sia-repair-welcome-text: In the following steps you can correct any moved annotation position.
sia-repair-info-text: After clicking Repair you will have to select a new position for the annotation.
sia-repair-done-text: The annotation's position has been updated.
sia-repair-all-done-text: You will now be redirected to the article page.
